Event.PageTitle: Bhaktha Hanuman | Harikatha Musical Discourse by Visakha Hari in London
Event.MetaKeywords: harikatha, musical tamil discourse, visakha hari
Event.MetaDescription: Bhaktha Hanuman, Harikatha a Musical discourse by Visakha Hari in London.
Event.EventHeading: Bhaktha Hanuman - Harikatha Musical Discourse by Visakha Hari
Event.Address: Canons High School, Shaldon Road, Edgware HA8 6AN
Event.Maindescription:
Dhruv Arts presents Vishaka Hari in a Harikatha (Musical Discourse). Experience the ecstatic mix of spirituality, music and talk.

Bhaktha Hanuman in English will be presented on 22nd March 2014 at 6.00 pm at Canons High School, Shaldon Road, Edgware HA8 6AN.

Accompanists:
Dr. Jyotsna Srikanth - Violin
RN Prakash - Mridangam
RR Prakash - Ghatam
Sithamparanathan - Morsing

For Tickets CLICK HERE
